msg: explain the intent behind the buckets API better

author: fanf
msg: Namespace-protect the tag of the structure containing the header of the
ring of buckets inside a brigade. The tag shouldn't be necessary but
aparrently the Windows compiler is broken without it.

author: fanf
msg: Fix inserting elements at the head and tail of a ring when the ring is
empty. Avoiding referring to the element type in the macros resulted
in some double dereferences that did the wrong thing.
